name: Admine
description:
Admine is a new take on a classic minesweeper puzzle game with procedurally generated levels that challenge the player to get to the exit through a mine infested facility. Featuring simple achievements focused on rewarding various player skills instead of pure grind and countless possible layouts of the levels, Admine provides a replayable experience in bite-sized chunks.Features
  • Classic Minesweeper puzzle with a newer spin
  • Procedural Level Generation
  • Music by 3kliksphilip
  • Clean, minimalistic design
  • Quick and easy to start gameplay for short sessions, with an option for a 'story' playthrough
  • 5 Difficulty levels ranging from small and simple office levels to sprawling server farms littered with traps
  • A Nightmare difficulty for people that want a challenge
  • Scores for speedrunners and completionists to try and improve
